Reviews.Title: The battery life is extremely short and the phone is always hot....
Reviews.Author: Fabian Buvat
Reviews.Content: I bought a "new" Blackberry bold and the battery is not lasting 3 hours.... The phone is always warm or hot. I feel scammed.It is the Last time I buy a phone on Amazon!!!! They never feel like 100% NEW!

Reviews.Title: Fui estafado
Reviews.Author: DON FERNAN
Reviews.Content: This item is bought thinking it was original, but it was not, the phone never worked, is a rebuilt computer, bad, never worked, always restarts when you want to fix something, restart, are thieves stole my money the publicly denounced.I want this message to be published, so that other people will not be cheated.I brought the article to Ecuador, thinking it was unlocked, and that was original, never worked, and still I have that came in the box, unused.Please do halgo Amazon against the seller, for stealing my money this way,I've always bought by Amazon, you can see my purchase history, but I think I will not buy more for Amazon, by the way I was scammed by this seller.MANUEL GILER INTRIAGOMAIL: donfergiler.5960 @ hotmail.com

Reviews.Title: Blackberry fan
Reviews.Author: carolmercury
Reviews.Content: I'm a blackberry fan, so my opinion is biased. This is standard blackberry, small size so it fits on your hand and the keyboard is easy to use, even for people with big hands.

Reviews.Title: excellent
Reviews.Author: Ricardo Ludwig
Reviews.Content: excelente muy buena pieza de coleccion saludos desde Venezuela espero comprar mas en algun momento por que son muy bonitas y buenas

Reviews.Title: RECIBIDO
Reviews.Author: Adelis Alvarado
Reviews.Content: EXCELENTE VENDEDOR REALIZARE MAS COMPRAS EN EL FUTURO, QUEDE SATISFECHO CON EL PRODUCTO Y HARE RECOMENDACIONES A TODOS LOS AMIGOS

Reviews.Title: I liked this
Reviews.Author: ROSA DE DUARTE
Reviews.Content: I recommend this product. I like this. excelent product. this year i will buy another BB  in this store by shooping

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: William E Suarez D
Reviews.Content: Tiempo de entrega perffecto, producto cerraado, excellente. Atencion y gestion, hermoso el telefono, super ligero , me enncantaaaaaaaaaa precioso simplemennte

Reviews.Title: tulio lara
Reviews.Author: Tulio Lara
Reviews.Content: buen equipo inteligente, es táctil y la capacidad de almacenamiento interno y de respuesta es mejor los demás modelos BOLD de blackberry

Reviews.Content: hermano hice la compra hace dias coloq la direccion y nada que llega por favor espero que me resuelvan el problemaa
